title: Ticket #3787: [coverity] Security groups ignored for Spot instances
description:
In condor_gridmanager/gahp_client.cpp, ec2_spot_start(): 

  7140
  CID 10417: Logically dead code (DEADCODE)After this line, the value of "groupName" is equal to 0.
  Assigning: "groupName" = "NULL".
  7141 const char * groupName = NULL;
  On this path, the condition "groupName != NULL" cannot be true.
  7142 for( groupnames.rewind(); groupName != NULL; groupName = groupnames.next() ) {
  Execution cannot reach this statement "requestLine += std::basic_s...".
  7143    requestLine += space + groupName;
  7144 }
  7145

This code will never actually send the security group names to the EC2 GAHP; HTCondor thus appears to ignore them.
remarks:
